bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lai 癩 , repudiation-illness. Because it was assumed already in ancient times that this disease is caused by bugs/worms, it was also called “bug repudiation-illness”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bai 柏 quoting Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 : 療瘑疥及癩瘡良 , “It is good in curing lair-illness, jie -illness, and repudiation-illness sores”, writes: 療瘑疥及蟲癩良 , “It is good in curing lair-illness, jie -illness, and bug repudiation-illness ”.
